name: Puppy Pee Pads
description: Some of our furry friends have some difficulty going outside to use the restroom. So we need your help to get this pads to help keep our shelter clean!

name: Blue Diamond Dog Food
description: This all natural dog food is great for our pups! The 50lb bags provide enough food for our dogs to eat healthy for about 2 weeks.

name: BestCare Pets Flea Protection Collar
description: These collars protect our adorable pets from fleas and are good for about 1 month. These are crucial in making sure are animals stay healthy and happy!

name: Walk our dogs!
description: We're looking for volunteers to walk our furry friends! Why not take a nice walk and make a new friend, our pups are always excited to meet new people and are very friendly!

name: Fun Toys for our dogs!
description: We are running low on chew toys for our amazing dogs. We need donations of toys to keep our fury friends entertained.

name: Garbage Plate for Mikey
description: Mikey and his group of friends are very hungry for a nice garbage plate!
